title: Kanye West Is Running Out of Platforms
description: The act of grabbing public attention has been a centerpiece of Kanye Westâ€™s art for two decades. Will audiences still tune in if his only outlets are on the fringes?
dc:creator: Jon Caramanica
media:credit: Julian Berman for The New York Times
media:description: Over the last two weeks, Ye has unleashed a string of provocations at a fashion show, on social media and in interviews.
